The SUPPORT.EPAM.COM workflows are aligned with ITIL standard, a widely recognized source of guidelines for ITSM.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"SUPPORT.EPAM.COM is the corporate system for processing end-user's requests.
